verbs.description: AT&T [V: was] hoping President Trump 's lawyer Michael Cohen could help the company win approval for its $ 85 billion acquisition of Time Warner , but instead , the company made " a big mistake . "

[ARG0: AT&T] was [V: hoping] [ARG1: President Trump 's lawyer Michael Cohen could help the company win approval for its $ 85 billion acquisition of Time Warner] , but instead , the company made " a big mistake . "
AT&T was hoping President Trump 's lawyer Michael Cohen [V: could] help the company win approval for its $ 85 billion acquisition of Time Warner , but instead , the company made " a big mistake . "

AT&T was hoping [ARG0: President Trump 's lawyer Michael Cohen] [ARGM-MOD: could] [V: help] [ARG1: the company win approval for its $ 85 billion acquisition of Time Warner] , but instead , the company made " a big mistake . "

AT&T was hoping President Trump 's lawyer Michael Cohen could help [ARG0: the company] [V: win] [ARG1: approval for its $ 85 billion acquisition of Time Warner] , but instead , the company made " a big mistake . "

AT&T was hoping President Trump 's lawyer Michael Cohen could help the company win approval for its $ 85 billion acquisition of Time Warner , but [ARGM-DIS: instead] , [ARG0: the company] [V: made] [ARG1: " a big mistake] . "
